C

changeColor(int) - Method in class characters.Player
Changes the color based on the number of lives left Green = 3 lives left Yellow = 2 lives left Red = 1 life left
Character - Class in characters
Character abstract class that has a position and coordinates each point of the character.
Character(int, int, int) - Constructor for class characters.Character
Creates a Character at (xPosition, yPosition) and initializes the corner coordinate array to pointCount.
